column4: Or tell me any other way of restoring those files.  (locale, rgb.txt, xkb, xserver)
what if programname doesn't match packagename? ;)
Then you try to find out what package it's from?
can't the parted utilities do that?
Not to my knowledge anyway.  They make some overtures like they're thinking about it, but don't quite pull through.  G anway, maybe QT works?...
Wait, maybe it just requires the suggested package, let me check something.
That did it.  I just didn't have the extra part because it was suggested and not a dependancy.
someone had problems with gparted and used qtparted with success
QTparted says it's active; what's that mean?  (Unmounted already)
no idea.  i'm just passing along the fact that someone had more succes w/ it
